title: #283: American Murder: The Family Next Door, Part 6
description:
RCP continues their dive into the Netflix documentary "American Murder - The Family Nextdoor". Jim and Laura put to rest questions about Nichol Kessinger's involvement in the murders. Lisa asks about the significance of the different disposal sites for poor Shanann, Bella and Cece. 


Real Crime Profile is so grateful to our sponsor’s this week:


Total Gym: ● Right now, Total Gym is offering a 30-day in-home trial on the Total Gym Fit for Just $1.  And no matter which Total Gym you try, our listeners can get an ADDITIONAL 20% OFF whatever discount they’re currently running. Just head to TotalGymDirect.com/REALCRIME to get this special offer. You MUST go to this URL, TotalGymDirect.com/REALCRIME, to get an ADDITIONAL 20% Off.  Or you can just call them at 1-800-385-0992. That’s 1-800-385-0992.
